search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Okta (okta.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official Okta pricing page URL is: [https://www.okta.com/pricing/](https://www.okta.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

Products
--------

With flexibility and neutrality at the core of our Okta and Auth0 Platforms, we make seamless and secure access possible for your customers, employees, and partners.

[Release overview](https://www.okta.com/products/release-overview/) [Pricing](https://www.okta.com/pricing/) [Free trial](https://www.okta.com/free-trial/)

### Okta Platform

[Single Sign On](https://www.okta.com/products/single-sign-on-workforce-identity/) [Adaptive Multifactor Authentication](https://www.okta.com/products/adaptive-multi-factor-authentication/) [Identity Governance](https://www.okta.com/products/identity-governance/) [Privileged Access](https://www.okta.com/products/privileged-access/) [Identity Threat Protection](https://www.okta.com/products/identity-threat-protection/)

[Explore Okta Platform](https://www.okta.com/workforce-identity/)

### Auth0 Platform

Why Okta
--------

Okta gives you a neutral, powerful and extensible platform that puts identity at the heart of your stack. No matter what industry, use case, or level of support you need, we’ve got you covered.

### Your Goals

[High-Performing IT](https://www.okta.com/workforce-identity/) [Optimized Digital Experiences](https://www.okta.com/customer-identity/) [Identify-Powered Security](https://www.okta.com/zero-trust/) [Innovation Without Compromise](https://www.okta.com/customer-identity/) [Agile Workforces](https://www.okta.com/workforce-identity/)

### Your Industry

[Public Sector](https://www.okta.com/okta-public-sector/) [Financial Services](https://www.okta.com/solutions/financial-services/) [Healthcare](https://www.okta.com/solutions/healthcare/) [Manufacturing](https://www.okta.com/solutions/manufacturing/) [Retail](https://www.okta.com/solutions/retail/) [Travel & Hospitality](https://www.okta.com/solutions/travel-hospitality/) [Technology](https://www.okta.com/solutions/technology/) [Nonprofit](https://www.okta.com/solutions/nonprofits/) [Energy](https://www.okta.com/solutions/energy/)

#### Training and support

[Contact us for details](https://okta.com/contact-sales/)

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

### Which suite should I purchase?

Our team can help you determine the right suite for your organization, but we have found that the Essentials Suite provides a strong foundation that meets most customers’ needs. When suite capabilities are implemented comprehensively, suites can provide a path to [Identity maturity](https://www.okta.com/resources/whitepaper-a-comprehensive-guide-for-your-identity-maturity-journey/) – from fundamental Identity management to Identity as a business enabler.

### Can I purchase individual products or additional products that aren’t included in my suite?

Yes. Almost all of our products are available for purchase individually and are also available as add-ons to enhance your selected suite.

### Can I purchase additional subscriptions of a specific product in a suite?

In most cases, no. Suites are designed to have a uniform quantity of subscriptions across all the products within a suite. To increase the number of subscriptions for a specific product in a suite, you must purchase additional subscriptions of the suite itself. There are exceptions for Workflows, Privileged Access, and Machine-to-Machine Tokens.

### Are there minimum or maximum subscription requirements for any of the suites?

No, provided you meet the $1,500 annual contract minimum.

### Are comprehensive support services available for purchase?

Yes. [Okta Premier Success Plans](https://www.okta.com/services/success-and-support/#premier) align with the complexity of your environment and provide the expertise and support you need from the right people, at the right time.

All Okta customers get access to [introductory training and online support](https://www.okta.com/services/success-and-support/) available 24 hours per day, five days per week.

### What are Okta Privileged Access Resource Units?

Okta Privileged Access usage is based on Resource Units, which you can acquire as part of a suite or purchase individually. With an entitlement to a pool of Resource Units, you can secure supported privileged Resource types, including Users and Servers.

The Essentials Suite includes 1 Resource Unit, while the Professional and Enterprise suites entitle you to the number of Resource Units equal to 50% of the total suite subscriptions purchased.

### What if I already have an access management solution?

Okta Identity Governance (which includes Lifecycle Management, Access Governance, and Workflows) provides access to core Identity management products without requiring you to replace existing SSO or MFA solutions.

### Can I purchase a suite on a month-to-month basis instead of annually?

No. All of our suites require an annual contract.

### Where can I find additional information about products and resources?

Browse our ever-growing collection of [on-demand webinars](https://www.okta.com/resources/content-library/?field_resource_solutions_target_id=All&type=webinar) and [datasheets](https://www.okta.com/resources/content-library/?field_resource_solutions_target_id=All&type=datasheet). Or check out our [help center](https://support.okta.com/help/s/?language=en_US&utm_source=google&utm_campaign=amer_namer_usa_all_ciam-all_dg-ao_a-ciam_search_google_display_site_pmax_utm2&utm_medium=cpc&utm_id=aNK4z000000UEqBGAW&gad_source=1&gclid=Cj0KCQiAst67BhCEARIsAKKdWOmTjQoyb9mSxiQbPpezf4PWQigrJBuazIozMt98MreVEbnxJ1oqoXUaAkjiEALw_wcB), which covers a wide range of topics geared toward current customers.

Privacy Preference Center
-------------------------

### Your Privacy

#### Your Privacy

We use cookies to provide the best website experience and to help understand marketing efforts. We may also share data with ad partners to reach potential customers across the web. To learn more, visit our [Privacy Policy](https://www.okta.com/privacy-policy/). Click here for [Your Privacy Choices](https://www.okta.com/your-privacy-choices/). You may also opt out of this sharing by signaling your preference via GPC, applicable only to the browser signaling the opt-out.  
[More information](https://www.okta.com/privacy-policy/)

*   ### Strictly Necessary Cookies
    
    #### Strictly Necessary Cookies
    
    Always Active
    
     Strictly Necessary Cookies
    
    These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms.    You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.
    
    Cookies Details‎
    
*   ### Functional Cookies
    
    #### Functional Cookies
    
     Functional Cookies
    
    These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages.    If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.
    
    Cookies Details‎
    
*   ### Performance Cookies
    
    #### Performance Cookies
    
     Performance Cookies
    
    These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site.    All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.
    
    Cookies Details‎
    
*   ### Share or Sell of Personal Data
    
    #### Share or Sell of Personal Data
    
     Share or Sell of Personal Data
    
    These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.
    
    *   #### Targeting Cookies
        
         Targeting Cookies
        
        These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites.    They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.
        
    
    Cookies Details‎
